```{r, setup, echo=FALSE}
library(bibtex)
library(RefManageR)
```

```{r, echo=FALSE, eval=TRUE, results='asis'}
bib <- RefManageR::ReadBib("rsc/amapvox-bibtex.bib")
RefManageR::NoCite(bib, "*")
RefManageR::PrintBibliography(bib, .opts = list(style = "text", sorting = "ydnt"))
```
